title: Vue/Snapshot Testing
description: I lead a discussion on unit testing with Vue, the benefits of Jest snapshot testing, and avoiding the pitfalls that come with snapshot-based tests. We also cover my Jest-Serializer-Vue-TJW library and how it solves many common Vue-specific snapshot problems for you.

title: How to Finish Projects & Craft Résumés
description: Gwen Faraday interviews me on project management topics, finishing projects, and crafting a developer résumé. This podcast contains excerts from both my "Finishing the Projects you Start" and "Crafting the Perfect Developer Résumé" talks.

title: Cross-Platform Desktop Apps (XPDA) and Vue.js
description: I lead a discussion on different tools for creating XPDAs. We also cover my NW-Vue-CLI-Example boilerplate for creating desktop apps with Vue.
